name: Heroes of Might and Magic V Mod
summary: An H5U file is a Heroes of Might and Magic V mod package. Players use H5U files to alter Heroes of Might and Magic V's gameplay. For example, a player might install an H5U file to alter a character's stats, abilities, and appearance.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .h5u to .zip ; decompress with any Zip-decompression utility
Ubisoft Heroes of Might and Magic V
